website_summaries.verdict: The right tool to sear, saute, bake, broil, braise, fry or grill, this wok is at home in the oven, on the stove, on the grill, or even over a campfire.
pros: Retains heat well Seasoned with oil for a natural, easy-release finish that gets better each time
Easy care: hand wash, dry, and rub with cooking oil
Base is flat and sits on stove without rocking
The base is heavy and thicker than the sides
Use it for everything from a few servings of soup to stir-fried chicken breasts or tofu
cons: Some woks may have large bump sticking out inside

customer_reviews.title: Second thoughts on size....
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Lodge 14" wok for months, and totally love it. Decided to get this smaller one for single-portion cooking or for those times when I need a second wok. This smaller unit is made to the same quality specs as the larger one -- no disappointments there. If you need a wok this size, this is a great one to get. That said, be sure that this size will work for you. By the time I put a good helping of food in it, it feels a bit cramped have room to stir and turn over the food as it is cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Don B

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for cooking Indian food
customer_reviews.text: This wok is exactly what I had been looking for. It is perfect for cooking Indian food. It is very stable. To season it, I washed it with hot, soapy water, heated it on the stovetop until completely dry, coated it with a thin film of oil, and baked it at 300 degrees for two hours. I plan to repeat the process to build up the seasoning. I am looking for vegetarian options to season this wok besides deep frying. Ideas, anyone? The wok gets very hot and retains heat well. The Lodge silicon assist handle holder (ASAHH41) fits loosely and does not provide much protection from the heat. I prefer to use a quilted pot holder instead.
customer_reviews.author: TheHappyGM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lodge Mini Wok
customer_reviews.text: Everything Lodge makes is in my kitchen- or at least one of each type. My husband, tells people. No, really he does. We love Lodge. This is the small Wok. We also have the big Wok. This thing is perfect for weekday nights when you just want to cook a little. It is wonderful. Our adult children eye it when they come over. They like to shop at Mom's house. I tell them to back off. There are deep sighs of resignation.
customer_reviews.author: SOEXCITEDUSA

customer_reviews.title: Wok Cast Iron lives up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: Lodge Wok cast iron is exactly what I expected from Lodge. Great company and made in the U.S.A. The wok is heavy due to the iron but it is durable, did not come with any coating (like some cast iron pans do which make it really hard to clean initially), and is easy to clean. I included pictures, one with a coffee cup so you can do a size comparison. This is great for someone cooking for a four or less people. This pan is very inexpensive for the value and will be around for years of use. Thanks Lodge for great quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Hdnclds

customer_reviews.title: Great little work
customer_reviews.text: Great little work, however I wish it was slightly bigger. The Lodge full size wok it bigger than I want, and this one is almost too small. If it was a little taller, and the same diameter at the 10.25" skillets, it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Best wok I ever owned. Right size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This wok is just right size for my Indian cooking needs for every day use. It is very stable and won’t wobble at all. The surface is non sticky and very easy to clean. And I am sure this will last more than a life time. Thank you lodge for this wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gayu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and Lodges quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’v Been enjoying my 14” Lodge Wok for years. Decided to get the 9” Lodge Wok to make smaller portions! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mini Wok - Lodge
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with I love Lodge Cast Iron - just ask my husband! I have so many pieces and hope to pass to my granddaughters and they will pass down to theirs. Thought this little wok was adorable- sometimes this size will be all you need- received promptly- but, keeps on rusting-used three times- after using clean with my little metal scrubber for cast iron-oil and heat like I always do with all my cast iron. Guess what? Rust!! Going to try a few more time then tossing this little pan- good concept-am really wondering if it is a second - sorry wanted so much to love this pan. Cannot recommend due to the rust.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: The best mini cast iron wok
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mini cast iron wok I have ever seen and used. It is better than a Teflon coated nonstick wok! See the video to see how easy it is to make pancake made from scratch. This pancake was made with raw rice and coconut milk batter fermented overnight.
customer_reviews.author: SebastianUSA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for One
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for a stir fry for one. Heated up to 450 F in about 4 minutes on my glass top electric range. Was easy to clean. Only drawback is you can’t hold it while stirring, the handles are iron and hot. But it’s heavy and doesn’t move much.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J Rymarczyk

customer_reviews.title: Black Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cast iron wok in July 2019 and have used it many times always with some hesitation, the reason being every time I season it and wipe it off for the next use the cloth has a lot of black stuff on it, it never lessens and I noticed recently that I have a metal taste in my mouth after cooking and eating, and a headache. Something is not right about this. I have a cast iron frying pan and do not have that problem at all. Don't think I can use this again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for frying
customer_reviews.text: Its the perfect size for deep frying and its sturdy and is solid on the stove top. Deep enough and small enough so you do not need to add a lot of oil and Lodge makes awesome cast iron stuff.
customer_reviews.author: saasha17

customer_reviews.title: Wok Me Baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say... Lodge has done it again. Currently, I am staying in an extended stay waiting for my apartment to become available. I couldn't take my other Lodge products it wouldn't have been practical. So I purchased the Lodge 9" in wok and was blown away. I prepared stir fried vegetables and rice with a bacon wrapped sirloin and gorged myself. I also purchased the Lodge rubber handles which made handling the wok a lot easier. Scrap that new age cookware and go old school. You will not be disappointed. Lastly, this wok also helps with food portionsing for a single person.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Josche' Smith

customer_reviews.title: I was happy when I found out that lodge also produced a ...
customer_reviews.text: I own a Lodge wok that I use when we cook for the whole family when we get together. I was happy when I found out that lodge also produced a smaller version, so I bought this small wok and I love it just like I love everything produced by Lodge: I think I own just about every size and shape item ever produced by Lodge and the quality is always unbeatable. this wok is just perfect size if you cook dinner for 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Galagan

customer_reviews.title: This is the only pan you need for Indian cooking
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to those who posted reviews on this related to Indian cooking. I have been searching for a cast iron wok to replace all my non-stick pans and finally found this. I use this for potato fry, okra fry and all other curries. The fries come out really crispy even with very little oil and taste a lot better than non stick pans. Also used it for deep frying puri, Vada and bajjis. You do not need any other pan if you have this.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek

customer_reviews.title: Look Ma! No Rust
customer_reviews.text: I have had plenty of electric deep fryers but wanted something for the stove top for Amish donuts. It holds three 3" donuts at a time. I thought I would prefer a bigger size but this one is perfect. If you use the right temperature and flip the dough only once, lay the donuts in paper towels, not greasy at all. This is my favorite frying pan. I was preoared to deal with the rust until it's well season but because of the cooking oil, I just wiped it off when cooled. No water was involved and no rust. Pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: Nice wok!
customer_reviews.text: Nice wok! I use an electric range (coils) and needed something smaller than the 12" wok that I have (stainless steel). Decided to try a cast iron wok, with which Lodge does well. It's a good wok and is seasoned very well. Normally when cooking fried rice, eggs may stick in my stainless steel wok, but this one handles it well. You can also use less heat since it holds and distributes the heat well. It's not too heavy, but definitely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey J

customer_reviews.title: Good size for two person type dinner
customer_reviews.text: I was initially looking for clay pots for some chinese clay pot recipes. However, clay pot cracks easily if you are not careful. I saw this Lodge 9" cast iron wok. It looks like a perfect size for my purpose and it's durable. Upon arrival, it looks perfect with no damage unlike the 9" lid I also ordered. It has a flat bottom so I could use it on the gas stove burner or my induction hot plate for occasional outdoor frying to avoid stinking up the whole kitchen. The size is really for two person type recipes as it is small and not very heavy. I think I'm going to enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: All the same great characteristics but in a more manageable size
customer_reviews.text: We originally purchased the 14 inch wok by Lodge. It was absolutely fabulous. Stir fry, deepfrying, and more we are still experimenting. Because it is just the two of us, we decide to try out the 9 inch wok. All the same great characteristics but in a more manageable size, perfect for dinner for one or two. Turns out cleanup is a breeze as well.
customer_reviews.author: Random Guy

customer_reviews.title: Cookware for one meal cooking.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good choice for one meal cooking. It has a flat bottom on the outside, wide enough for stability, but the interior bottom has a rounder surface as one would expect for a wok. Less time is needed to bring the wok to cooking heat and as one would expect, less oil is needed for this small wok to do deep frying. I cooked eggs over easy with it and the wok kept the eggs in a compact shape for a nice presentation. I expect many years of service from this cast iron pot.
customer_reviews.author: South TX Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but pain to clean
customer_reviews.text: The Pan is good for cooking, but it is really hard to clean this thing. Not exactly how we expected. We have a 4 year old pan of same size that still works better than this. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rishabh Ganjoo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & size
customer_reviews.text: It is what we expected. Center bottom was weighted which was good because there was no long handle to hold as you stir fry in the mini wok, something we must get use to. We noticed rust marks after our first wash but then we re season it again. It’s probably something you’ll have to do on a continuous basis. Cook-wash-season. Repeat. As you can see in the picture, the bacon turned out perfect and because it’s a wok shape, there weren’t as much splatter as cooking on a flat pan.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Wok for a single person or couple.
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE the size. I live alone & a full size wok would be to much. Bonus! it keeps my iron levels up this is a plus in my opinion. The only downside is that they " preseason" it. I HATE that!! I'll season it as I see fit! I just don't like the preseason crap, otherwise, there is nothing wrong with this. it's an awesome little wok!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet~Witch

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Amazon packaging not so good.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, as are all of my Lodge Products. HOWEVER, I am not impressed with whoever at Amazon shipping thought that it was a good idea to place 3 of these loose, BARE cast iron woks, in one big box, without packing material AND with other fragile items that were damaged during shipment. SMH.
customer_reviews.author: Just trying to get delivery in good order.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!!! I got it for Christmas and I have made several meals! I personally think that the cast iron makes the food cook better and taste even better. The bowl heats up evenly, quick, and easy to clean up. I am going to get some for birthday gifts because I just love it! The only thing I would say is that it is a little on the small size more for like a 2-3 people. If you are wanting to make a meal for 6 people you will need a bigger size but this is prefect for 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken...
customer_reviews.text: I only knocked off one star because this is not the manufacturer's fault - I was very excited to receive this beautiful wok, only to notice that the base was chipped - my plan was to use this to deep fry but I think this would affect the stability and make accidents more likely ... I appreciate that Amazon accepted a return and I will probably add more Lodge pieces to my collection one day, but I think I'll be waiting until the pandemic is over ... I know Lodge stopped manufacturing new pieces for the time being, so maybe I've been having bad luck because we're getting to the bottom of the existing stock ...
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkinzee

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for forever
customer_reviews.text: Man I love this thing! Going to throw other pans away. Except soup pans buying the 14 inch version of this! Flavor in foods it helps a lot more. I got like a two or 300 hundred pan set. The 9 inch and 14 inch will replace four or 5 other pans. But will keep soup pans that’s not a part of the set. Downside I don’t think I can make an omelette using these that’s the only thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie S

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1-2 people
customer_reviews.text: I have a 13" cast iron Lodge wok that takes ~20 minutes to heat up - I bought this smaller wok to speed up dinner making. It's a great little wok that fits the perfect amount of food for 1-2 people and heats up on my stovetop in 5-10 minutes. I'm using the original seasoning that it came with and haven't had any sticking issues while cooking Thai noodles and fajitas. It's very easy to clean and much lighter than my big wok.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A FANTASTIC LITTLE WOK
customer_reviews.text: I really love this little walk! I simply don't understand the 1-star reviews. I've had this wok for several months and used it many times with no issues whatsoever. The seasoned coating is superb and it cleans up easily and food really doesn't stick very much. I LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Moviewhisperer

customer_reviews.title: 9-inch wok is a beautiful piece of cookware.
customer_reviews.text: Never realized that Teflon cookware imparts an odd chemical taste to foods until I cooked in a skillet that had no teflon. Really enjoying this beautiful cast iron piece. Cleaning it is no.more difficult than cleaning Teflon.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Nice pot
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this cast iron wok. The inside is very pitted while the outside has a smooth finish. It's advertised as seasoned but it's not. It's going to take several layers to season it correctly. Still it's a great wok shaped pot (I wouldn't call it a wok). I've had some great meals with it. Including a very delicious Turkey Shepard's Pie. It goes well in the oven and under the broiler. If you're thinking of getting this pot, get the matching lid to go with it. You can use it was a mini Dutch oven. (I ordered one to complete the set.)
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.. in all aspects- be it the size, heat distribution, durability, maintenance and most importantly, the output. This mini wok works great for my day to day Indian cooking. The loop handles makes it easy to move it around. I have used it for deep frying and the result is simply magical.. Very much satisfied with this Cast iron wok from Lodge.
customer_reviews.author: cv

customer_reviews.title: So adorable, I want to cuddle it!
customer_reviews.text: There's just something downright aesthetic about this wok. Maybe it's the size (for cooking for 1-2 people), or the shape (nicely concave), or maybe the two symmetric handles. It's really cute, and because it's so small, you get a cast iron wok that you can lift with one hand. So far I have used it to fry steaks, brown chicken and then used it as a pot to make chicken soup. Pre-seasoned (kosher), so can be used after just a quick wash and light greasing. I use a chainmail scrubber (the Ringer) that I bought especially for cleaning this wok. Very glad I got that - cleans perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Lodge item
customer_reviews.text: Great in the RV. Stir fry for one or two. Get then on sale sub 11 bucks. Use two over two propane burners means you can get them hot enough to stir fry. One big wok is too hard to get hot enough.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great for deep frying and curries.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to get hot. Bottom has sharp edges which scratched my glass stove top. But it’s perfect for deep frying with small amounts of oil, and for making curries. As a wok, it’s suitable for certain dishes like Kung pao chicken, but doesn’t hold much food so it’s not great for veggie stir frys unlessntoure inly cooking for one. This fills a gap in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Orange Crush

customer_reviews.title: No Lodge Tag in the Wok
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine. But it did not have a lodge tag on it...just a price sticker and a generic tag which said - Made in USA. The lodge brand is imprinted in the wok itself but I was wondering if it’s a genuine lodge wok as it did not come with the official Lodge Tag. Yet to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for a small family......
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for a small family.I use it regularly for my Indian cooking. Very even heat distribution and easy clean up. Needs just enough maintenance as any cast iron utensil. Not very heavy either. Maybe will buy another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the wok recently and been using it quite regularly .. I recommend the product , firstly due to the health benefits of cooking in an iron pan n secondly due to the durability n the ease of cooking in it. I don’t miss the previous nonstick ones at all. My kitchen is all nonstick n plastic free.. Thanks to the cast iron varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Paddu

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: If you use an induction cooktop this is a great wok. The walls are a little too steep and it could probably work better with a handle and wider bottom. It's not easy to flip the food and scrape it off the sides but it's simple and elegant. I can recommend it still if you don't have the space or need for a full sized wok.
customer_reviews.author: mark henderson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Used it several times. Cleaned as directed. Sprayed with Pam. Scrambled eggs and they slide right out. No sticking. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Greywolf

customer_reviews.title: It even looks as great as it works!
customer_reviews.text: I wok a lot. Carbon steel wok and cast iron wok. This bad boy is great for single serving everything. Want to experiment? This is your toy. Mini deep fryer? Yes please! Make shit helmet for things hitting the fan?! Well gee Lodge you have thought of it all. Highly recommended for those who want an awesome single service sized cast iron wok. Also comes in handy to hold things down in windy situations.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Neville

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Wok order handles covers
customer_reviews.text: Wash in Hot Water (no soap) then I dry, Wipe through with a little olive oil, with a paper towel, to maintain stick free.
customer_reviews.author: Manus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: It’s the cutest pot I ever owned. Perfect size for making stir fries and Indian deep fried items( poori and vada). Perfect size and easy to maintain
customer_reviews.author: varun

customer_reviews.title: lodge cookware is #1
customer_reviews.text: I bought this extra when I bought the lodge cookware set. I cured it on the grill outside and it looks great. It blackened up real nice. This will last forever! Thanks...
customer_reviews.author: K4gwb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who wanted a iron cast. And she absolutely loves how this does its job perfectly for an Eastern/Western cuisine. The heat is well distributed throughout the cast and works perfectly well for Korean style cuisines. I highly recommend it for anyone who are looking to add an iron cast in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Lodge continues to do wonderful cast iron products which are durable and of a high standard of quality. Though it is heavy the benefits of cooking in cast iron significantly outweigh this one discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Vinay Radhakrishnan

customer_reviews.title: One great wok for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This wok is amazing! Heat evenly and make a very good spring rolls, egg rolls and any thing you make that requires deep frying. The more you use it, the more it creates patina much makes a lot easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: lyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun bowls for individual serving dishes. A bit large as such though.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. Fun bowls for individual serving dishes. Used for Bibimbap. A bit larger than I had imagined, but happy with them. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I bought this little wok....it is perfect when I am just cooking for me..I use it on an induction burner and let it heat till the handles are hot..add oil and sear away..cooks so quickly. While it was pre-seasoned..I did just go ahead and season it again before the first use. I would re -purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Carpediem7131

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item twice and each time this item became junk. Just after 2 uses its peel like anything also lots of rust.
customer_reviews.author: arti chatwal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Love their quality.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for rehearing cooked food and keeping it warm at the dinner table. I ordered Lodge’s 14” Wok and show a comparison in size. On it’s left is their other Lodge Wildlife Series 10.25 Skillet. Behind both is the Cephalon cast iron 12 inch Skillet. Hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: A Khan

customer_reviews.title: Good size for small stir fry.
customer_reviews.text: Great size wok for stir frying for one or two meals. I have a lot of Lodge products and this one is good also. Heavy but all iron pans are.
customer_reviews.author: River Gourmet Cook

customer_reviews.title: perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: For all you Mallu's loking for an induction appam pan, works well, perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Best Wok Ever
customer_reviews.text: I adore this cast iron wok. Today, I made corned beef hash in it and afterwards it was so easy to clean. I’ve used cast iron before but this is the first to cook so well and so very easy to clean. I use it every single day since I received it! Great for eggs, veggies, meats unbelievably great!
customer_reviews.author: Berna

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought a larger iron wok, and it works fine, but it is heavy, very heavy. This wok is the right size for one, or maybe more. I fine\d it easier to clean than I had expected. I do recommend the stainless steel link scrubbers and then reoil after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Make nice stir fries and easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I got the 14” first but it’s way too heavy for daily use. Then I realized there is this smaller size. I use it almost every time for stir fry since I got this one. The color and the taste of food is awesome, especially meat on cast iron. In addition, it is easy to clean and manage during the cooking process.
customer_reviews.author: A mom likes to cook

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shape
customer_reviews.text: Close but it's shaped more like a soup bowl than a wok. Sides are too steep and inside bottom is ' flat.' Not really flat either, it's slightly bowed upwards so if you add a little oil, it forms a ring around bottom edge where a true wok, the oil would puddle in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Moreball

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using my mini wok. It's easy now to make stir fry for two. No waste, easy clean up, fast aand ready to use next go round. Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Indian cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I have used lodge cast iron products for over 16 years now. Used this one for deep frying puris, vadas etc, I made curries in it! This one is the quintessential kadai! Does not feel heavy to use as it has two handles! I WASH, DRY and OIL it after every use, if anything gets stuck on just pour some water and heat it, just comes off easily!
customer_reviews.author: BEE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For One Person
customer_reviews.text: This small cast iron wok is one of my favorite purchases from Amazon! It is perfect for one or two people and I make everything in it from stir-fries to soup. The base is very stable and it's going to last forever. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This “mini wok” is just the right size for a small dinner
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this extremely useful pot. I have cast iron fry pan and a Dutch oven. The iron pots and pans I saw in the shops are too large for me. This smallish 9 inch size for me at this point! I am looking forward to using it - I might even buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: MAUREEN A. OBRIEN

customer_reviews.title: A nice wok
customer_reviews.text: I own two woks and this is my absolute favorite. I cook with an electric stove (coil burners) and this works well for me. It does hold heat longer than my other wok but I don't find that to be a problem. It cleans up easily. I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Good for one or two people
customer_reviews.text: The usual great quality from this company. A perfect size for cooking stir-fry for just one or two people, when a standard size wok would be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinda

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product at great price. I love it. It keeps food hot for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Not like other Lodge cookware I have.
customer_reviews.text: I own so many lodge cookware. What happened to the quality? No matter how i clean, this leaves strange taste in my food which stays in my mouth! Are you sure you are using the same method to make this product as other pans? Or from the past??
customer_reviews.author: Shinah Lee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Top quality Lodge cast iron. Small handy size for quick single meal or meal for two. I'd say I'd buy it again, but like all my other Lodge cast iron pieces, I'm sure this one will last for generations.
customer_reviews.author: Number One

customer_reviews.title: great wok
customer_reviews.text: loved the product, this was exactly the wok my wife was looking for. She was searching for a cast iron wok since quite sometime and this fits the criteria perfectly. Heats evenly and perfectly. Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil

customer_reviews.title: Nice little pan for two people
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this little wok because it is just perfect size for two of us and light weight too. Can not comment on the durability since I only got this last week and have used it twice since then
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cauldron for a long time and came across this as a last resort... but when it arrived, I was so surprised and happy to see the size, quality and heaviness. I am so happy I found this item and purchase it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sierre

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: After installing new induction cooktop in my kitchen,found this wok after lot of research.its worth to have this as it’s suitable for all kind of cooking,specially for Indian deep frying.It’s heavy,which is normal for cast iron utensil.i love this one .I just wish that it was light to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh I C

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this almost every day and it has endured well. I recommend using. A gentle soap and then immediately drying and rubbing in some oil before storing.
customer_reviews.author: Pr

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Does great for frying meats for tacos. Sauté’s or makse a small stir fry like a champ. Possibilities abound.
customer_reviews.author: Verified buyer

customer_reviews.title: The Cast Iron Wok to have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cast iron mini wok by Lodge. I have recommended it to a lot of my friends. It is particularly suited to Indian style cooking. It's weight is both the pro and con. Makes it quite to difficult to lift and pour out the stir fries for eg. But can't complain.Its quite versatile and very useful for the regular home cook.
customer_reviews.author: Anuradha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little pan - perfect size for 2
customer_reviews.text: We love stir fry but I hate using those HUGE pans. This is perfect for us, and could probably be used even to make side dish for three.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Telesco

customer_reviews.title: Versital favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cooker for single serve. Mates well with single induction burner. Frequently goes from burner to table for single vessel that keeps food hot and makes cleanup quick.
customer_reviews.author: LITTLEBILL

customer_reviews.title: lovely
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made. Nice Lodge quality. I bought 2 and they came in stacked without any stuffing papers. I can't believe they survived the shipping without damages.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Size
customer_reviews.text: An excellent size for smaller servings with enough room for stir. Holds heat very well.
customer_reviews.author: ASpen

customer_reviews.title: Could be an heirloom.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for cooking small amounts for one to two people. Definitely works on induction stoves because it is cast iron. Make sure you dry it well when you are done and then you will be able to pass it down to one of your grandchildren someday.
customer_reviews.author: toopoorto retirenow

customer_reviews.title: Great lil Wok
customer_reviews.text: Love how cute this little wok is. It's perfect for me. It fits on the small electric burner with the outside burner not being covered by it. I might have to buy the bigger one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nova Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I am a huge Lodge cast iron collector, try to cook with them as much as I can and couldn't wait for these to arrive! I have the large wok but wanted individual ones for my family as we all like different ways our ramen and soups are prepared. I will be using them for many things. Dessert, pot pies, etc. I did put them on the wood plate that came with my Lodge fajita cast iron skillets to protect my table from the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan and Britanee Davis

customer_reviews.title: The rust comes out from this product will
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of rust it will kill people..We need to call health and safety and tell them to stop this product this is not cool.....How can we eat sommuch of rust...i was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sacheen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy worth every penny and much more!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little work! Got it today seems perfect for a lot of things. I love that I don't have to pull out the big wok for small stir fry.
customer_reviews.author: BMM

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing like cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: I really like my little wok. It's just the right size for one person serving. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: bookwoman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different sizes of these woks and they are fantastic. They heat very evenly and they are of very high quality and easy to clean and maintain. They come preseasoned, so after cleaning you just need to put a little oil in and rub it down all over. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to fit the family size and small enough for easy handling and storage
customer_reviews.text: Just the right shape and size for everyday cooking. Big enough to fit the family size and small enough for easy handling and storage.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: great size
customer_reviews.text: perfect for two.....I recommend buying the cover at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cookware for the money
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for good cast iron cookware from quite sometime.. the one available in market were very costly .. but I found this qorth the money.
customer_reviews.author: $Onkar$

customer_reviews.title: Cute litttle wok
customer_reviews.text: It came rusted and I had to season it again. It’s good for everyday use . Like all cast iron cleaning and taking care of it is a pain but worth it
customer_reviews.author: AhQuad

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy, difficult to handle
customer_reviews.text: This is simply too heavy for normal cooking, may be only good for wok. Takes a lot of time to heat and also to cool down. Disappointed. Very durable but make sure it doesn’t fall on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, thick and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Material seem to be high quality, although the workmanship is no better than other cheaper non-US brands. I have seen superior finishing on the Chinese pans, pots and woks.
customer_reviews.author: Mihail A. Popa

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for 2-3 people
customer_reviews.text: Good pan, doesnt hold the heat as well as you would expect castiron too, one handle had a hairline crack, but other than thats its a good size, and works pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: keven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and proudly made in USA. I love it so far..It saves a lot in heat bill, food is amazingly tasty in it and build quality is excellent. I highly recommend this one to anyone who is looking for a cast iron utensil...
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Thapa

customer_reviews.title: Lodge Cast Iron Wok
customer_reviews.text: It's lodge, what do expect. Already partially seasoned, cooks evenly and quickly; just don't leave standing water in it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love all lodge products, specially this one. Right size to use as a frying pan for deep frying items as well as for other cooking. Size is apt for a family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: They smell bad sometimes worth replacement and trying
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth cast iron product from lodge Got it for $16.16 But I ended up returning this because it stinks even after washing it with mild soap and seasoning it and using it twice I wish to try it again for same price now it shows 23.18
customer_reviews.author: pradeep kumar Gujjar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kadai for Indian food
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it regularly for my daily indian cooking. It’s not very heavy because of the 2 handles. Perfect for a family for 3. Good buy and very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Too much expensive
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mini wok, although everyone said it’s expensive. After use of two months, this look ugly and chipped. 😏
customer_reviews.author: Arun Kumar

customer_reviews.title: great size - perfect for cooking for 1-2 people
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan - can't go wrong with lodge!
customer_reviews.author: dogs R4ME

customer_reviews.title: Just For 2 People Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This wok is perfect for 2 people and is durable,everything you want from cast iron.I will be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wathey

customer_reviews.title: Worth buy
customer_reviews.text: Using it for a while now and it is totally worth, cleaning is a bit difficult and I wish I knew an easier way to clean it. Size is good for 2-3 people and we use it for frying mostly
customer_reviews.author: Sarik

product_meta.title: Lodge 9 Inch Cast Iron Mini Wok w/ Loop Handles
product_meta.description: Lodge 9" seasoned cast iron mini wok features a flat base and dual handles for a safe, secure grip when transporting. Seasoned with oil for a natural, easy-release finish that improves with use, this wok is perfect for exotic cuisines or home spun favorites. The Lodge cast iron mini wok retains heat well, making short work for any dish. The right tool to sear, saute, bake, broil, braise, fry or grill, the wok is at home in the oven, on the stove, on the grill or over the campfire. Cast iron is unparalleled in heat retention and even heating. Great for induction cooktops. Easy care: hand wash, dry, rub with cooking oil. The Lodge 9" seasoned cast iron lid (sold separately) fits this item.
feature_bullets: 9 INCH CAST IRON MINI WOK W/ LOOP HANDLES. This mini server is seasoned and ready to use. For exotic cuisines or home spun favorites, the Lodge Cast Iron Mini Wok retains heat well, making short work of any dish

PRE-SEASONED COOKWARE. A good seasoning makes all the difference. Lodge provides pre-seasoned cookware with no synthetic chemicals; just soy based vegetable oil. The more you use your iron, the better the seasoning becomes

MADE IN THE USA. Lodge has been making cast iron cookware in South Pittsburg, Tennessee (pop. 3,300) since 1896. With over 120 years of experience, their cast iron is known for its high quality design, lifetime durability, and cooking versatility

MAKE EVERY MEAL A MEMORY. Lodge knows that cooking is about more than just the food; it’s about the memories. This dynamic skillet can be used for both hot and cold presentations and has superior heat retention from the oven to the table

FAMILY-OWNED. Lodge is more than just a business; it’s a family. The Lodge family founded the company in 1896, and they still own it today. From environmental responsibility to community development, their heads and hearts are rooted in America

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,370 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
